version_description:
Go team USA! Share your selfies and enter the SelfieYo 2018 Games!
- New beauty filter enhancements
- Press & hold to delete your sent photos
- Meet people when you share public videos
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Improved video recording and fixed a few bugs. Share vibes to your local feed.
See and share what's happening around you! This update adds support for iOS 13, some bug fixes and some new location features we'll be expanding more.
This update has some bug fixes and performance improvements. Take your best selfie, share with people around you!
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements!
Bug fixes and improvements!

New Feature: Burn Content -- because tomorrow never dies, but sometimes last night does. 
A couple bug fixes, too!

For the real ones, post and find 'em on SelfieYo. 
Here's what's new:
• BURN CONTENT - quickly remove all your public and private photos, videos and chats you've posted on SelfieYo.
• FEED SWIPE - easier to enter your public and private message lists by swiping from the main, local feed.
• BAR TAG - tag the bar, restaurant or club you're at. 

We've got something coming soon that'll make your night game even more 2020... so for now, start tagging your selfies at a few spots when you're out and about.

Major SelfieYo update designed to up your social game. You're not going to want to miss this.

Here's what's new:

1. SelfieYo HotSpots — a fast and easy way to have virtual chats with people around you at restaurants, bars and coffee shops. Interact with others nearby when you're out or looking for a place to go.

2. Unique Color Themes — Change the look of your SelfieYo app to reflect your mood. Check out the Black Neon, Canary Yellow, America and Rainbow themes, just to name a few. More to come and we're open to your suggestions!

3. SGT Rewards — We're introducing a new way to help you earn some extra support — it's called SGT. That stands for SelfieYo Gold Tokens. It's a crypto rewards coin built into SelfieYo where you can require others to pay you if someone random wants to send you a private message. We know that sometimes there are too many people DM'ing you, so by requiring them to pay a little SGT toll, you get a higher quality experience of meeting new people around you AND you bank some SGT crypto coins.

Go forth, be you, meet new friends and earn some SGT.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Added Face ID and some performance enhancements.
Performance enhancements and bug fixes. Improved the tipping feature for sending SGT crypto tips to people you chat with on SelfieYo.
Performance updates and improvements.
New color themes: Wild Orchid, Rastafarian and Neon Rainbow! To modify your theme, go to Settings from the side menu bar.
Updates to Rastafarian Red, Liquid Rainbow and Neon Black themes! Also, some bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes, yo.
Bug fixes and performance improvements! New users can register super fast with the QUICK ACCESS option. Try it!
Performance updates!
Performance enhancements and bug fixes.
Speed enhancements and bug fixes.
